name: aquarius
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a person pouring water from a jar: Uranus is in the faint constellation Aquarius, the Water-bearer.
[ C or U ] the eleventh sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 21 January to 19 February, represented by a water carrier, or a person born during this period: If your birthday is January 22 then your star sign is Aquarius. I'm a Scorpio and my husband is an Aquarius.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a lone bright star at the bottom end of Aquarius. The vernal equinox is moving gradually toward a rendezvous with Aquarius.She wears a necklace with her zodiac sign, Aquarius.Aquarius, like Libra, is an air sign.

the eleventh sign of the zodiac, covering the period January 20 to February 18 and represented by a person carrying water, or a person born during this period
